snippet.title: How to Convert your Quickbooks Desktop File to Quickbooks Online
snippet.description:
How to Convert your Quickbooks Desktop File to Quickbooks Online

Need help with your startup’s bookkeeping? Kruze Consulting is a leader in providing low-cost, high-quality financials to funded startups. Learn more at https://kruzeconsulting.com/startup-bookkeeping

This is the new way. This is, weve been doing this for five years, join the cloud revolution. Theres no reason to have all your QuickBooks information tied up in a single file when it can just be accessed online. QuickBooks Online is so much easier. So let me just tell you how to do this. Im recording this video because we still get this request quite a bit when were talking to new prospects. And so basically what youre going to do is youre going to, you log into QuickBooks Desktop and then make sure your file, like your whole QuickBooks Desktop is all up to date. Save that, save the file. A lot of people sometimes are doing this conversion when they dont actually have a QuickBooks Desktop program. nnLike this happens to us quite a bit. Like someone will send us their file. And so for us we have to actually download a trial version of QuickBooks Desktop. So you can just Google QuickBooks Desktop trial version, Intuit has some really good help links on this by the way. Download that trial piece of software, they will actually let you start or convert one account without having to pay for QuickBooks Desktop. So theyre very nice about this. They want to incentivize you to get on QuickBooks Online as well. 

I think Kruze, on our website, you can click and we have a discount link you can just click through and I forget what the discount is, its like 30% or something like that. Feel free to do that. And then you are going to, once you have your QuickBooks Online account set up, you are going to go back to QuickBooks Desktop and there is, in the file menu there is an export option you can do. You are going to click that and then its going to run you through a series of prompts and ask you what the destination is and where in QuickBooks Online you want to convert it. Its all super easy. Its going to be like, its easier than easy. It shouldnt take you like two minutes to do this, but its going to be very obvious when you log in to the QuickBooks Online account, what the destination, what its called. Youre going to click
